# NSURLQueryItem

**Class**

An object representing a single name/value pair for an item in the query portion of a URL.

## Declaration

```swift
class NSURLQueryItem
```

## Overview

In Swift, this object bridges to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLQueryItem]; use [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLQueryItem] when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.

You use query items with the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLComponents/queryItems] property of an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLComponents] object.



## Creating a Query Item

- **init(name:value:)**: Initializes a newly allocated query item with the specified name and value.

## Reading a Query Item’s Name and Value

- **name**: The name of the query item.
- **value**: The value for the query item.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
